snippet: Mark Harper, who had led a crackdown that urged illegal immigrants to “go home,” stepped down after revealing that his house cleaner of six years had been living in the country illegally.
abstract: British Immigration Min Mark Harper resigns after revealing that his house cleaner of six years was living in country illegally; Harper has played leading role in crackdown on illegal immigration in Britain.
lead_paragraph: Mark Harper, who had led a crackdown that urged illegal immigrants to “go home,” stepped down after revealing that his house cleaner of six years had been living in the country illegally.

headline.main: Household Worker Trips Up Britain’s Immigration Minister
headline.print_headline: Household Worker Trips Up Britain’s Immigration Minister
